meanings.definition: An alkaloid, C21H23NO5, found in opium.
meanings.english_definition: An alkaloid, C21H23NO5, found in opium.

examples.sentence: Cryptopine is one of the many alkaloids found in opium.
examples.translation: クリプトピンは、アヘンに含まれる多くのアルカロイドの一つです。

etymology.value: From crypto- (hidden) + opine (referring to its presence in opium).
